name: Zoo Photographer
description:
Little game demo that I created in about a week to test Unity's networking.

You can play solo or multiplayer online.

Basic premise is to take photos of a random list of animals in a zoo and be the first to complete the list.

Animal Models used are from David O'Reilly - https://davidoreilly.itch.io/everything-library-animals

I may update it in the future to add more features/fix bugs.
